title: formlos
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001438/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001438/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : formlos**

[formlos](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001438/http:/www.formlos.net/) is an independent ( Corporate ) Design Bureau, and [Type Foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001438/http:/www.formlos.net/formlosTF),  
residing in the heart of Europe, founded by [David Hubner](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001438/http:/typophile.com/wiki/David%20Hubner)

formlos, David Hubner  
 [www.formlos.net](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001438/http:/www.formlos.net/?Typophile)
author: Dav
